page.title: 07 HOUSING IN KENNINGTON
page.content: Most houses in Kennington are detached or semidetached (detached houses are houses totally on their own. Semidetached are joined to another house on one side.) The oldest style of houses still erect are Victorian. Today, houses are being built more and more like the older types. In the last 20 years, very many new houses have been built. Many of these houses have been built by the Ashford Borough Council for families who have moved from London to settle here. Some houses are installing double glazing and building extensions.{BRODADHURST {DRIVE}is the most recent estate. Old people's homes have been built near THE PASTURE and in{LOWER VICARAGE {ROAD.}
